name: Arcade Merged!
description:
Arcade Games Merged Into One Game!

Classic Arcade Style Games Unite!

Use All Your Arcade Wits To Overcome Challenges!

See how far you can go!

See how fast you can go!

See how big your combo & ship powers can go!

See how high your score can go!


The idea is to merge many different classic arcade-game styles into a single game where the player can race towards the finish; go for a high score; go for the largest combo; try to win with the least shots; competing on a leaderboard.

  

Ran out of time for the jam; sharing what I had so far.  Planned for additional enemy/gametypes; player powerups; improved leaderboards; adjusting the sounds and music.  Also have an idea on how to do controls for mobile.

Prototype Game Idea Made for Score Space #14

 3 Day Game Jam July 30 to August 2 2021

Cherished sound effects are borrowed for this game jam from the GNU General Public License Version 2 source code from Blades of Exile by Spiderweb Software

Music and everything else done by me specifically for the jam.

Made with Godot Engine

Supports both controller and keyboard.

Touch controls planned but not implemented due to time constraints

The Godot HTML5 Export of the Game is; not very tested but here to try out

Recommend downloading and playing the Windows build
